review: very poor experience with her... she never hear patient problems *********** she has no value of other people's time...

review: Very comforting, helpful, experienced. Down to earth and full of motherly advice along her medical knowledge

She is very nice and polite. With her we feel that we are in safe hands. My both children are delivered by dr roopam Arora. We are going cloudnine hospital for delivery only because of dr roopam. We like her most and thanks.

**** **** *** Very experienced Dr. Satisfactory results.
She is very good human being also. I m very thankful to her.
